      • VentanaDeslizante

        public VentanaDeslizante(ij.ImagePlus img,
                 ij.ImagePlus saliency,
                 ij.ImagePlus convolucion,
                 ij.ImagePlus convolucionSaliency,
                 int numHilo,
                 java.awt.Rectangle sel,
                 Graphic imgPanel,
                 javax.swing.JProgressBar progressBar,
                 int[][] defectMatrix,
                 boolean entr)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        img - Original image
        saliency - Saliency map image
        convolucion - Image to perform the convolution operation
        convolucionSaliency - Saliency map image to perform the convolution operation
        numHilo - Number of thread
        sel - User selection
        imgPanel - Grphics instance with the image
        progressBar - ProgressBar where the progress is going to be written
        defectMatrix - Matrix indicating the number of windows that consider a pixel as faulty
        entr - Training flag
